summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.2 mm), light levels (up 3000 lux), and cloud levels (up 442 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1376 m), light levels (up 5351 lux), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 441.9m lower than yesterday, 976.8m lower than past week, 1375.9m lower than past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 860m minimum and 3110m maximum, with an average of 1431.4m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2410m and 2810m.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, very clammy and humid. Showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and bright intervals likely. Weather could become unsettled.
